subject: Boxing
Jews
lead_paragraph: Yuri Foreman, a rabbinical student and undefeated professional boxer, wears the Star of David on his boxing trunks and a black skullcap when studying or praying.
snippet: Yuri Foreman, a rabbinical student and undefeated professional boxer, wears the Star of David on his boxing trunks and a black skullcap when studying or praying.
